description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCustomerGroupCollectionByIdCustomer()`. Got `$idCustomer` but expected to be `int $idCustomer`. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `queryStringCompare()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
